meanings.definition: Of or relating to the process of depositing something.
meanings.sent1: The depositional process involves placing items carefully in a container.
meanings.sent2: The depositional stage of the project required us to carefully place each piece in order.
meanings.sent3: She had a depositional approach to organizing her books, making sure each one had its place.
meanings.sent4: The depositional nature of the task reminded him of how carefully he needed to handle fragile items.
meanings.sent5: The depositional method of arranging the flowers made the whole room look more organized.

meanings.definition: Involving the act of depositing or placing something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: He depositional the coins into the piggy bank one by one.
meanings.sent2: She depositional the documents on the desk for safekeeping.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to be depositional nuts in various hiding spots around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The river's flow depositional sediment along its banks, creating new land.
meanings.sent5: The chef depositional dollops of cream on top of the dessert to enhance its flavor.
